books.title: Thinking Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.synopsis: How much do you know your mind? We have two systems that govern the way we think: System 1, which is fast and emotional and System 2, which is deliberate and logical.

books.title: The Power of Habit
books.author: Charles Duhigg
books.synopsis: Where do habits come from? How do habits form? How can we change our habits?

books.title: Intuition Pumps
books.author: Daniel Dennett
books.synopsis: Mental models and thinking tools for a more open mind.

books.title: The Checklist Manifesto
books.author: Atul Gawande
books.synopsis: In terms of keeping organized, on track, and remembering the little things in the midst of something huge, checklists are severely underrated.

books.title: Mindset
books.author: Carol Dweck
books.synopsis: There is fixed mindset and there is growth mindset. One hinders us; the other opens up new possibilities for our personal and professional growth.

books.title: Creativity, Inc.
books.author: Ed Catmul
books.synopsis: How do we happen upon that 'spark' of creativity? How can we bottle it up and find continuous streams of it?

books.title: The Black Swan
books.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
books.synopsis: What if you didn't know as much as you think you did? What if what you DON'T know is actually more important than what you do know?
